Certainly! Here are two movie recommendations that fit the sci-fi and adventure genre, but with a softer touch:

1. "The Martian" (2015) - directed by Ridley Scott, this science fiction film follows astronaut Mark Watney as he becomes stranded on Mars after his crew mistakenly believes him dead. Through perseverance and resourcefulness, Watney manages to survive on the Red Planet for seven months before finally being rescued by his fellow astronauts.

2. "Life of Pi" (2013) - directed by Ang Lee, this science fiction film tells the story of an Indian boy named Pi who survives a shipwreck that leaves him alone on a lifeboat. Through his resourcefulness and ingenuity, Pi manages to survive on the lifeboat for 227 days before finally being rescued by a passing ship.

I hope these recommendations are helpful in finding a great historical movie to enjoy.
